div.p: Call your doctor if you experience symptoms, or our COVID-19 hotline at (616) 391-2380 to schedule a free virtual screening.*
If your symptoms are life-threatening, call 911.

p.em: *Free screening available for all individuals in the state of Michigan.

div.h4: Prevention Starts With Washing Your Hands

div.p: Washing your hands often with soap and water for 20 seconds is one of the easiest and most effective ways to prevent the spread of germs.
Avoid contact with people who are sick.
Cover your cough and sneeze with tissue.
Avoid touching eyes, nose and mouth.
Clean and disinfect surfaces and objects frequently.
Stay home when you are sick, except to get medical care.

Spectrum Health is offering free virtual screenings to any Michigan resident who is experiencing symptoms and has concerns that they may have COVID-19. Callers to the hotline will be scheduled for a virtual video visit and assisted with downloading the Spectrum Health Now app. During the virtual video visit, individuals will be asked a series of questions about their condition by a Spectrum Health provider who will advise whether they need to seek additional care. Call (616) 391-2380 to schedule a virtual visit.
